meanings.sent1: The soiled shirt had mud stains all over it.
meanings.sent2: She washed the soiled dishes after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The soiled puppy left paw prints all over the clean floor.
meanings.sent4: The soiled walls of the old house told stories of neglect and time.
meanings.sent5: The soiled snow looked gray and sad under the cloudy sky.

meanings.sent1: Please do not soiled your clothes while playing outside.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally soiled the carpet with spilled juice.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler soiled his hands with paint during art class.
meanings.sent4: The rain soiled the freshly washed car, leaving dirty streaks.
meanings.sent5: The careless hiker soiled the trail by leaving trash behind.
